item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯银行为大型项目大举发行创纪录的债券
item.description: 由于流动性紧缩，王储穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼数万亿美元的经济转型计划面临压力，沙特阿拉伯的银行今年可能会筹集创纪录数额的债务。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s banks could raise a record amount of debt this year as a liquidity squeeze strains Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman’s multi-trillion dollar economic transformation agenda.】

item.title: 露西会让查理在日本踢足球吗？
item.description:
日本央行将提高政策利率，最终结束通货紧缩时代的希望再次燃起。【原文：

Hope springs again that the Bank of Japan will raise policy rates and finally end the deflationary era.

】

item.title: 南非的下一个能源挑战：耗资 210 亿美元的电网升级
item.description:
国有电力公司 Eskom 面临重大资金限制

State-owned power company Eskom faces major funding constraints

】

item.title: 安哥拉通胀和经济增长忧虑预示利率下调临近
item.description: 安哥拉央行周五开会时，决策者将在鼓励经济增长与抑制高通胀之间取得平衡，预计央行要么加息，要么按兵不动。【原文：Angola’s central bank is expected to either hike interest rates or stay on hold when it meets on Friday, as policymakers balance the need to encourage economic growth against curbing high inflation.】

item.title: 据称 KKR 将考虑以 10 亿美元出售连锁学校 EuroKids
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，KKR & Co 正在探索欧洲儿童国际公司的各种选择，包括出售其在印度学前和早期教育连锁机构的控股权。【原文：KKR & Co is exploring options for EuroKids International, including selling its controlling stake in the Indian pre-school and early-learning chain, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 担忧中国经济增长，澳大利亚股市本周跌幅全球最大
item.description: 由于对中国经济的担忧给大宗商品市场带来压力，澳大利亚股票的主要指标本周有望成为全球主要基准中表现最差的。【原文：The key gauge of Australian stocks is on track for the worst performance this week among major global benchmarks, as worry about China’s economy weighs on the commodities-heavy market.】

item.title: 冷却市场缺乏项目，新加坡房屋销售下降
item.description: 由于缺乏新项目的推出，新加坡 2 月份的房屋销售量有所下降，这进一步证明市场正在降温。【原文：Singapore home sales fell in February on a lack of new project launches, adding to evidence that the market is cooling.】

item.title: 流动性担忧加剧，万科销售额创 2018 年以来最大跌幅
item.description: 中国万科集团（China Vanke Co., Ltd.）的销售额出现了六年来的最大跌幅，使这家正努力避免首次债务违约的中国房地产开发商雪上加霜。【原文：China Vanke Co. posted its biggest sales decline in six years, adding to the woes of the Chinese property developer that’s trying to stave off its first-ever debt default.】

item.title: 中国供应收紧，铜价重拾涨势，直逼 9000 美元
item.description: 由于有迹象表明中国的供应量将下降，而全球需求前景正在改善，铜价继续向每吨 9,000 美元迈进，并有望创下 2023 年 1 月以来的最大单周涨幅。【原文：Copper resumed its march toward $9,000 a ton and was poised for its biggest weekly gain since January 2023 on signs Chinese supply will drop just as the global demand outlook is improving.】

item.title: 前牙买加政府官员认为机会薪酬结果将促使三月加薪
item.description: 一位前日本央行官员认为，在工资谈判的早期结果强劲之后，日本央行政策委员会有可能在周二抓住机会结束负利率。【原文：A former Bank of Japan official sees a chance the bank’s policy board will seize the opportunity to end its negative interest rate on Tuesday after early results of wage negotiations came in strong.】

item.title: 瑞士信贷前亚太区主管 Edwin Low 加入收购公司 GIP
item.description: 据知情人士透露，瑞士信贷前亚太区首席执行官 Edwin Low 已加入私募股权公司 Global Infrastructure Partners。【原文：Edwin Low, Credit Suisse’s former chief executive officer for the Asia Pacific region, has joined private equity firm Global Infrastructure Partners, according to people with knowledge of the move.】

item.title: 韩国对华投资创历史最大降幅
item.description: 在美国推动其盟国减少对中国政府的依赖之际，韩国去年对中国的直接投资流量创下了三十多年来的最大降幅，这表明两国之间的经济联系正在减弱。【原文：South Korea’s direct investment flows into China last year fell by the most in data going back more than three decades in a sign of weakening economic ties between the two countries as the US pushes its allies to reduce their reliance on Beijing.】

item.title: 日本 GPIF 将在中断 4 年后恢复借出外国股票
item.description: 全球最大的日本国家养老基金将恢复借出外国股票，此举将为做空者提供更多股票，四年前该基金曾暂停过这一做法。【原文：Japan’s state pension fund, the world’s largest, will resume lending foreign stocks in a move that would make more shares available for short sellers after it suspended the practice four years ago.】

item.title: BTG 支持的公用事业公司关注 Eletrobras 工厂，仍以 Vibra 为目标
item.description: 天然气和电力生产商 Eneva SA 希望通过从巴西国家电力公司（Eletrobras）购买热电厂并与燃料分销商 Vibra Energia SA 合并，在巴西实现增长。【原文：Natural gas and power producer Eneva SA is looking to grow in Brazil by purchasing thermal plants from Eletrobras and merging with fuel distributor Vibra Energia SA.】

item.title: 小米撼动中国电动车行业，让竞争对手 XPeng 望尘莫及
item.description: 小米公司（Xiaomi Corp. ）与老牌竞争对手新鹏公司（XPeng Inc.【原文：Xiaomi Corp.’s foray into electric vehicles and how it might shake up the industry in China will be scrutinized when it reports earnings alongside established competitor XPeng Inc. next week.】

item.title: 首席执行官因使用冒犯性语言辞职，Tabcorp 股价暴跌
item.description: 澳大利亚博彩公司 Tabcorp Holdings Ltd. 首席执行官因在工作场所使用攻击性和不恰当语言而突然辞职，周五该公司股价暴跌。【原文：Tabcorp Holdings Ltd. shares slumped Friday after the Australian gaming company’s chief executive officer abruptly resigned after using offensive and inappropriate language in the workplace.】

item.title: 研究称，货物盗窃使墨西哥食品价格上涨 7.6
item.description: 货物失窃使墨西哥的杂货价格上涨，商界领袖对日益严重的不安全局势表示担忧。【原文：Cargo theft is raising grocery prices in Mexico as business leaders express concerns over growing insecurity.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。交易员对美联储前景摇摆不定。经济学家担忧中国一年期借贷成本下降。一则关于日本负利率即将结束的报道令日元岌岌可危。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. Traders waver on Fed outlook. Economists brace for lower one-year borrowing costs in China. A report that Japan’s negative rates are poised to end roils the yen. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Kristine Aquino】

item.title: 贝莱德和 Man Group 在日本央行决议前透露日本大额赌注
item.description: 抢购更多日本股票、加大国债空头力度、继续买入日元：这些都是大牌基金经理在央行会议召开前最受欢迎的呼吁，这次会议可能会结束全球最后一次负利率试验。【原文：Snap up more Japanese stocks, ratchet up shorts on government debt and keep buying the yen: these are some of the most popular calls from big-name money managers ahead of a central bank meeting that may end the world’s last experiment with negative interest rates.】

item.title: 国际能源署（IEA）预测转为赤字，石油价格维持在四个月高位附近
item.description: 国际能源署（IEA）预测，在欧佩克+维持减产的前提下，到2024年将出现供应赤字，改变了早先对供应过剩的预测，石油维持在四个月高位附近。【原文：Oil held near a four-month high after the IEA forecast a supply deficit through 2024, changing its earlier projection of a surplus, on the premise OPEC+ maintains production cuts.】

item.title: 市场参与者等待日本央行加息关键的工资结果
item.description: 日本最大的工会组织将于周五公布数十年来最受关注的工资数据，这些数据可能足以促使央行自 2007 年以来首次加息。【原文：Japan’s largest union group will release the most closely scrutinized wage figures in decades on Friday, numbers that may be strong enough to nudge the central bank toward raising interest rates for the first time since 2007.】

item.title: 对万科的空头押注飙升，表明投资者对债务的担忧
item.description: 针对中国万科的空头押注激增，表明本周的反弹可能稍纵即逝。【原文：A surge in short bets against China Vanke Co. suggests this week’s rally may prove fleeting.】

item.title: 印度银行家的加薪幅度将高于新加坡和香港
item.description: 据彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）称，今年印度金融专业人士的加薪幅度将高于香港和新加坡，这凸显了随着中国经济增长放缓，企业如何利用印度的经济繁荣。【原文：Finance professionals in India are in line for higher salary hikes than those in Hong Kong and Singapore this year, underscoring how firms are tapping the nation’s economic boom as China slows, according to Bloomberg Intelligence.】

item.title: 阿达尼的下一个重大考验是为拥挤的孟买建造耗资 20 亿美元的机场
item.description: 在孟买严重拥堵的机场东南约 22 英里处，头戴硬礼帽的工人们正在高高的脚手架上建造另一个机场。其他工人正在削平附近的一座小山，以完成两条跑道中的第一条，从而使印度的金融之都终于拥有了第二座机场。【原文：About 22 miles southeast of Mumbai’s badly congested airport that opened 82 years back, workers in hard hats are high up on scaffolds building an alternative. Others are flattening a nearby hill to finish the first of two runways so that India’s financial capital can finally have a second airport.】

item.title: 民意调查显示，墨西哥谢因鲍姆在选票竞争中领先 19 个百分点
item.description: 根据 3 月份的一项民意调查，墨西哥执政党总统候选人克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）领先其主要反对党对手科希特尔-加尔韦斯（Xochitl Galvez）19 个百分点。【原文：Mexico’s ruling party candidate for the presidency, Claudia Sheinbaum, is ahead of her main opposition rival Xochitl Galvez by 19 percentage points, according to a March poll.】

item.title: 美国股市和债券大跌后亚洲股市将下跌：市场综述
item.description: 由于新的数据削弱了美联储即将降息的理由，继华尔街股市下跌之后，亚洲股市周五开盘即告下挫。【原文：Equities in Asia were primed for a downbeat open Friday after declines on Wall Street as new data weakened the case for imminent Federal Reserve interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 日本顶级债券经理认为今年的销售将再创佳绩
item.description: 日本顶级债务承销商预测，无论央行的政策如何，公司债券和武士债券的销售在 4 月开始的财政年度中将再创佳绩。【原文：Japan’s top debt underwriters are predicting another strong performance for corporate and Samurai bond sales in the fiscal year starting April, regardless of what the central bank does on policy.】

item.title: 中国的财政刺激计划可能比表面看起来更大
item.description: 中国领导层看似克制的 2024 年预算计划令投资者大跌眼镜。但仔细观察一下标题数字，就会发现该方案可能比最初想象的更有力度。【原文：China’s leadership underwhelmed investors with a seemingly restrained 2024 budget plan. But a closer look beyond the headline numbers suggests the package could pack a bigger punch than initially thought.】

item.title: 货币市场资产连续第三周创下新纪录
item.description: 货币市场基金资产升至历史新高，原因是交易员们收敛了对美联储今年首次减息的押注，预期短期利率将在更长时间内保持高位。【原文：Money-market fund assets rose to a fresh record high on expectations short-term rates will remain elevated for longer after traders reined in bets on the first Federal Reserve cuts this year.】
